MAIN_MESSAGE: There is power cut in the KA19 postcode area of Maybole. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 2:27am. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and are working to get supplies restored. So far we still working to locate the fault on our overhead electricity network in the area near Crosshill and we now expect your supply to be restored by 2:15pm. We understand that being without power is frustrating and please be assured we will restore your supply as soon as we possibly can. If for any reason this information changes then we will update this message. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:51am on 14th February 2021
